attributes.action: force local councils to make the bin men put back wheelie bins where they found them
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Anyone who is in a wheelchair or anyone who has a young child which they push around in a buggy will know that bin day is they most annoying and dangerous day of the week, due to bin men emptying the bins and leaving them, once empty, anywhere they please, knowing full well that the bins they leave blocking the pavements will force people pushing buggy's & wheelchair users to use the road at great risk. 
We would like the bin men to put back the wheelie bins where they found them, not blocking the pavement. Residents are considerate enough to do this... why aren't the bin men? They demand enough rules from us, make this a rule for them to put the bins back where they found them and not block the pavement.
